meanings: (말·힘·무기 등으로) fight, do battle (with); (말다툼하다) argue, quarrel; (전쟁을 하다) be at a war (with)

examples.korean: They gathered soldiers to fight the invading army. 발음듣기 그들은 침략군과 맞서 싸울 병사를 모집했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
